trans-unit.source: Defines an area that receives and displays ink strokes.
An <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> is an element that can be used to receive and display ink input.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>是可以用來接收和顯示筆墨輸入項目。

trans-unit.source: This is commonly done through the use of a stylus, which interacts with a digitizer to produce ink strokes using a stylus or a mouse.
trans-unit.target: 這通常是用手寫筆互動與數位板產生使用 stylus 或 mouse 筆墨筆劃。

trans-unit.source: The created strokes are represented as <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> objects, and can be manipulated either programmatically or based on user input.
trans-unit.target: 建立的筆觸會表示為<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>物件，而且可以是以程式設計方式管理，或根據使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> enables users to modify or delete an existing <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>可讓使用者修改或刪除現有<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> can be bound to a data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>可以繫結至資料來源。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> property to: a base-64, encoded string that contains ink data in Ink Serialized format (ISF); or even to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> property of another <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>屬性： base 64，編碼的字串，包含資料筆跡序列化格式 (ISF)，或甚至的筆墨<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>另一個屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: You can also bind properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>, to other data sources.
trans-unit.target: 您可以也將屬性繫結，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>，其他資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to simulate the use of both a pen and a highlighter on the same <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何以模擬同時具有畫筆與螢光筆在同一個使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that the root element in the markup language (XAML) file is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel> called `root`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設標記語言 (XAML) 檔案中的根項目是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DockPanel>呼叫`root`。

trans-unit.source: It also assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> called `switchHighlighter` and that both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> events are connected to the example's event handler.
trans-unit.target: 它也假設有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>呼叫`switchHighlighter`且同時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>事件都已連接到範例的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The following example declares two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> objects in XAML and establishes data binding between them and other data sources.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會宣告兩個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>XAML 中的物件，並建立其與其他資料來源之間的資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>, called `ic`, is bound to two data sources.
trans-unit.target: 第一個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>，稱為`ic`，繫結至兩個資料來源。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A> properties on `ic` are bound to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> objects, which are, in turn, bound to arrays defined in the XAML.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>屬性`ic`繫結至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>物件，接著，繫結至定義在 XAML 中的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> properties of the second <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> are bound to the first <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> in the following code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributes%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>屬性的第二個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>繫結至第一個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>下列程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the InkCanvas class.
Gets the current editing mode of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
The current editing mode of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前的編輯模式的<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingMode%2A> property indicates the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingMode%2A>屬性會指出目前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: Suppose that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.Ink> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByPoint>.
trans-unit.target: 假設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.Ink>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByPoint>。

trans-unit.source: When the tablet pen is used in an inverted position, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingMode%2A> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByPoint>.
trans-unit.target: 以反向的位置，使用 tablet 畫筆時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingMode%2A>的值為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByPoint>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, its value is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.Ink>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，其值是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.Ink>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current editing mode changes.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingMode%2A> property changes whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> enters a new editing mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingMode%2A>屬性變更時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>進入新的編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.Ink> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByPoint>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.Ink>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByPoint>。

trans-unit.source: When the user changes the tip of tablet pen, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingModeChanged> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者變更 tablet 畫筆尖端<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingModeChanged>就會發生事件。

Indicates whether the contents of the Clipboard can be pasted into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the contents of the Clipboard can be pasted in; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> can support Clipboard data in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] format, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)], and text format.

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將項目複製到剪貼簿，並將它以貼<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設為呼叫的項目`rect1`，而且<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件已連接至在範例中的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.target: 子元素的集合位於<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />。

trans-unit.source: Copies selected strokes and/or elements to the Clipboard.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> can support Clipboard data in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] format, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)], and text format.

trans-unit.source: Strokes to the Clipboard are both [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] format, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 剪貼簿的筆劃都[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]格式， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)]。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>呼叫`textbox1`和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>呼叫`button1 -`thatboth 控制項的子元素而且<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: Deletes the selected strokes and elements, and copies them to the Clipboard.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> can support Clipboard data in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] format, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)], and text format.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> stores only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> properties for each <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> belonging to a stroke.

trans-unit.source: You can use the DefaultStylusPointDescription property to store additional information about points comprising the strokes on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用這個屬性中的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultStylusPointDescription%2A> so that the stylus points of the strokes on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> contain the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.TipButton> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultStylusPointDescription%2A>使手寫筆的點上筆劃的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>包含<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.X>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.Y>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>，和<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.TipButton>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Only the strokes that are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> after the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultStylusPointDescription%2A> is set to contain the additional property.
trans-unit.target: 新增至 strokes<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>之後<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultStylusPointDescription%2A>設定為不含額外的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the renderer that dynamically draws ink on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
The renderer that dynamically draws ink on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
trans-unit.target: 轉譯器，以動態方式繪製上的筆墨<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DynamicRenderer%2A> property to a custom <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> if you want to customize the ink.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DynamicRenderer%2A>屬性設為 custom<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>如果您想要自訂的筆墨。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DynamicRenderer%2A> is a member of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DynamicRenderer%2A>隸屬<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DynamicRenderer%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> removes the old <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugInCollection> and adds the new <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DynamicRenderer%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>移除舊<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>從<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugInCollection>並加入新<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>至集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: This may change the behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會變更行為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user editing mode used by an active pointing device.
The editing mode used when a pointing device (such as a tablet pen or mouse) is active.
trans-unit.target: 作用中時 （例如滑鼠或 tablet 畫筆） 裝置使用的編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.Ink>.
trans-unit.target: 預設的 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> 是 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.Ink>。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> clears any existing selections.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>清除任何現有的選取項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> specifies the mode of the pointing device as it interacts with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>指定指標裝置的模式，因為它與互動<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> is used by some digitizers when the "eraser end" of the stylus contacts the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> 會使用某些潀糔蠮當手寫筆的 「 橡皮擦結束 「 連絡數位板時發生。

trans-unit.source: This property controls the actions that are performed when the stylus is inverted.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會控制當手寫筆轉換會執行的動作。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> property controls actions that are performed when the stylus is in a standard, tip-down position against the digitizer,
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>屬性會控制當手寫筆在數位板，針對標準的提示下執行的動作

Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape" /> used to point-erase ink from an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
The eraser shape associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
trans-unit.target: 橡皮擦圖形相關聯<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />。

trans-unit.source: This shape will be used to erase ink from an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> when the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByPoint>.

trans-unit.source: Individual properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape> cannot be modified once the shape has been created.
trans-unit.target: 個別屬性<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StylusShape>圖形建立之後無法修改。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EraserShape%2A>, the cursor rendered on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> is not updated until the next <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> change.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EraserShape%2A>，資料指標上呈現<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>不會更新直到下一個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>變更。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to set up an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> to recognize application gestures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>辨識應用程式的筆勢。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture" /> routed event.
The element of which to get the bottom property.
Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Bottom" /> attached property for a given dependency object.
The bottom coordinate of the dependency object.
The following example demonstrates how to get the position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of application gestures that are recognized by <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
A collection of gestures that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> recognizes.
The following example demonstrates how to get the enabled application gestures from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得從啟動的應用程式筆勢<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.IsGestureRecognizerAvailable" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
The element of which to get the left property.
Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Left" /> attached property for a given dependency object.
The left coordinate of the dependency object.
The following example demonstrates how to get the position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: The element of which to get the right property.
Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Right" /> attached property for a given dependency object.
The right coordinate of the dependency object.
The following example demonstrates how to get the position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> objects that are selected in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
Array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> objects.
This method returns only <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> objects, not <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只會傳回<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>物件，不<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>物件。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve selected <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> objects, call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.GetSelectedStrokes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取選取<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>物件，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.GetSelectedStrokes%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>, users can select <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> objects and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>，使用者可以選取<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>物件和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>物件。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, both types of objects can be selected using code: just call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 或者，這兩種類型的物件可以選擇使用程式碼： 只需要呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example doubles the height and width of each selected element on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將增加一倍的高度和寬度的每個選取的項目上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> that represents selected <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> objects on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
The collection of selected strokes.
This method returns <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> objects, only.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>僅限物件。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve selected <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> objects, call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.GetSelectedElements%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取選取<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>物件，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.GetSelectedElements%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>, users can select <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> objects and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>，使用者可以選取<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>物件和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>物件。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, both types of objects can be selected using code: just call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 或者，這兩種類型的物件可以選擇使用程式碼： 只需要呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example changes the color of each selected stroke on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會變更色彩的每個選取的筆觸上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounds of the selected strokes and elements on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
The smallest rectangle that encompasses all selected strokes and elements.
The following example prevents the user from making a selection smaller than its original size.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會防止使用者進行選取範圍小於其原始大小。

trans-unit.source: The element of which to get the top property.
Gets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Top" /> attached property for a given dependency object.
The top coordinate of the dependency object.
The following example demonstrates how to get the position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何取得的位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the requested child element in the collection.
Overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.Media.Visual.GetVisualChild(System.Int32)" />, and returns a child at the specified index from a collection of child elements.
The requested child element.
This should not return <see langword="null" />; if the provided index is out of range, an exception is thrown.
An object that specifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> to hit test against.
Determines whether a given point falls within the rendering bounds of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
An object that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> that is returned from a hit test.
The point to hit test.
Returns a value that indicates which part of the selection adorner intersects or surrounds the specified point.
A value that indicates which part of the selection adorner intersects or surrounds a specified point.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.HitTestSelection%2A> method to determine whether the point is within a stroke selection's bounds or on one of the eight handles.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.HitTestSelection%2A>方法，以判斷點是否筆劃選取範圍的界限內或其中一個八個控點。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when performing drag and drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 執行拖放作業時，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how use <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.HitTestSelection%2A> to determine whether to create a <xref:System.Windows.DataObject> to initiate drag and drop.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.HitTestSelection%2A>來判斷是否要建立<xref:System.Windows.DataObject>啟始拖曳和卸除。

trans-unit.source: To implement drag and drop between two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> objects, see [How to: Drag and Drop Ink](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-drag-and-drop-ink.md).
trans-unit.target: 實作拖曳和卸除兩個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>物件，請參閱[How to： 拖曳和卸除筆跡](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-drag-and-drop-ink.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ink presenter that displays ink on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
The ink presenter that displays ink on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的筆墨筆墨展示器<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets (determines) whether the gesture recognition component is available on the user's system.
<see langword="true" /> if the recognition component is available; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果辨識元件功能。否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to configure an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> to recognize application gestures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>辨識應用程式的筆勢。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Left" /> attached property.
Returns enumerator to logical children.
The available size that this element can give to child elements.
Infinity can be specified as a value to indicate that the element will size to whatever content is available.
Measures the size in layout required for child elements and determines a size for the <see cref="System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> object.
The size that this element determines it needs during layout, based on its calculations of child element sizes.
Gets or sets a Boolean value which indicates whether the user is enabled to move selected ink strokes and/or elements on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
<see langword="true" /> if a user can move strokes and/or elements on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果使用者可以移動筆劃及 （或） 項目<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, an adorner border is drawn around ink strokes and/or elements when they are selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，筆墨筆劃及 （或） 項目周圍繪製裝飾框線時選取此選項。

trans-unit.source: This border enables the user to move the selected objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個框線可讓使用者移動選取的物件。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ResizeEnabled%2A> is `true`, the adorner enables the user to resize the strokes and/or elements as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ResizeEnabled%2A>是`true`，裝飾項可讓使用者調整大小的筆劃及/或項目以及。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false` while one or more ink strokes and/or elements are selected, the adorner border will be automatically removed from the selected objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`false`時選取一或多個筆墨筆劃及/或項目，裝飾項框線會自動移除從選取的物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example prevents a user from moving and resizing the elements and strokes on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例可防止使用者移動和調整大小的項目和筆劃上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingModeChanged" /> event.

Provides an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.InkCanvasAutomationPeer" /> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.
The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.DefaultDrawingAttributesReplaced" /> event.
The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeChanged" /> event.

This event occurs after the editing mode has been changed; the changes are reflected in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 變更的編輯模式; 之後，就會發生此事件所做的變更會反映在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInvertedChanged" /> event.

This event occurs after the inverted editing mode has been changed; the changes reflected in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 變更轉換的編輯模式; 之後，就會發生此事件變更反映在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture" /> event.
The event data that describes the property that changed, as well as old and new values.
Invoked whenever the effective value of any dependency property on this <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> has been updated.
The specific dependency property that changed is reported in the arguments parameter.
Overrides <see cref="M:System.Windows.DependencyObject.OnPropertyChanged(System.Windows.DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs)" />.
The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanged" /> event.
This method is called after a set of ink strokes and/or elements has been selected by the user and the selection change has been applied.
trans-unit.target: 已由使用者選取的筆墨筆劃及 （或） 項目集，並已套用的選取範圍變更之後，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Before the change is applied, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnSelectionChanging%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在套用變更之前，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnSelectionChanging%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanging" /> event.
This method is called when a new selection of strokes and/or elements is made by the user, but before the change is applied.
trans-unit.target: 使用者，但在套用變更之前進行新的選取範圍的筆劃及 （或） 項目時，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: After the change has been applied, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnSelectionChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在套用變更之後，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnSelectionChanged%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Not used.
An event announcing that the user selected and moved a selection of strokes and/or elements.
This method is called after a selection of strokes and/or elements has been moved by the user and the change has been applied.
trans-unit.target: 使用者已移動選取的筆觸和 （或） 項目，並在套用變更之後，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Before the change is applied, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnSelectionMoving%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在套用變更之前，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnSelectionMoving%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoving" /> event.
This method is called after the user requests that a selection of strokes and/or elements be moved and before the change is applied.
trans-unit.target: 在使用者要求移動選取的筆觸和 （或） 項目之後，以及套用變更之前，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: After the change is applied, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnSelectionMoved%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 套用變更之後，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnSelectionMoved%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResized" /> event.
This method is called after a selection of strokes and/or elements has been resized by the user and the change has been applied.
trans-unit.target: 選取的筆觸和 （或） 項目已由使用者調整大小，並在套用變更之後，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Before the change is applied, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnSelectionResizing%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在套用變更之前，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnSelectionResizing%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResizing" /> event.
This method is called after the user requests a selection of strokes and/or elements be resized and before the change is applied.
trans-unit.target: 在使用者要求選取的筆觸和 （或） 項目調整大小之後，以及套用變更之前，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: After the change is applied, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnSelectionResized%2A> method will be called.
trans-unit.target: 套用變更之後，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnSelectionResized%2A>會呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.StrokeCollected" /> event.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnStrokeCollected%2A> is called when a user physically completes a stroke, for example, by raising the stylus from a tablet after making a motion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnStrokeCollected%2A> 使用者實體會完成筆觸，比方說，藉由引發筆移離平板電腦後移動時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A programmatic addition of strokes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> collection will not call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnStrokeCollected%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 筆劃，以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>集合不會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.OnStrokeCollected%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.StrokeErased" /> event.
The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.StrokeErasing" /> event.
The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.StrokesReplaced" /> event.
Pastes the contents of the Clipboard to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> can support Clipboard data in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] format, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)], and text format.

trans-unit.source: Pastes the contents of the Clipboard to the top-left corner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> can support Clipboard data in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] format, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isf](~/includes/tlasharptla-isf-md.md)], and text format.

A collection of enumeration values.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the user can resize selected ink strokes and/or elements on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
<see langword="true" /> if a user can resize strokes and/or elements on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果使用者可以調整大小的筆劃及 （或） 項目上<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, an adorner border is drawn around ink strokes and/or elements when they are selected.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，筆墨筆劃及 （或） 項目周圍繪製裝飾框線時選取此選項。

trans-unit.source: This border enables the user to resize the selected objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個框線可讓使用者調整選取的物件大小。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.MoveEnabled%2A> is `true`, the adorner enables the user to move the strokes and/or elements as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.MoveEnabled%2A>是`true`，裝飾項可讓使用者移動筆劃及 （或） 以及項目。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false` while one or more ink strokes and/or elements are selected, the adorner border is automatically removed from the selected objects.

trans-unit.source: The following example prevents a user from moving and resizing the elements and strokes on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Right" /> attached propertyy.
Selects a set of ink <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> objects and/or <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> objects.

An <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> can contain <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> objects, which are created in response to user stylus input, and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> objects, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>可以包含<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>物件，也就建立以回應使用者手寫筆輸入及<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>物件，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>物件。

trans-unit.source: Selected strokes will be displayed with an adorner around them for ease of recognition and manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 方便辨識和管理其適用的裝飾項會顯示所選取的筆劃。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> objects will not display differently when selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 選取時，不會以不同的方式顯示物件。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> objects to select.
Selects a set of <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> objects.

An <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> can contain <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> objects, which are created in response to user stylus input and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>可以包含<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>回應使用者手寫筆輸入中建立的物件和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>物件。

trans-unit.source: Selected strokes are displayed with an adorner around them for ease of recognition and manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 選取的筆觸會顯示其適用裝飾項，以方便辨識和管理。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects will not display differently when selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 選取時，不會以不同的方式顯示物件。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> in `selectedElements` is not in the Children collection, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Select%2A> ignores the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>中`selectedElements`不在子系集合，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Select%2A>忽略<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: The following example selects all the strokes and two elements on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會選取所有筆劃和兩個項目上的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> called `textbox1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> called `button1` - and that both controls are child elements of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>呼叫`textbox1`和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>呼叫`button1`-，而且兩個控制項的子元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

Selects a set of ink <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> objects.

An <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> can contain <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> objects, which are created in response to user stylus input, and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> objects, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>可以包含<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>物件，也就建立以回應使用者手寫筆輸入及<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>物件，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>物件。

trans-unit.source: Selected strokes are displayed with an adorner around them for ease of recognition and manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 選取的筆觸會顯示其適用裝飾項，以方便辨識和管理。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> objects do not display differently when selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 物件不會顯示以不同的方式選取。

trans-unit.source: The following example selects all the strokes and two elements on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會選取所有筆劃和兩個項目上的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> called `textbox1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> called `button1` - and that both controls are child elements of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>呼叫`textbox1`和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>呼叫`button1`-，而且兩個控制項的子元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: One or more strokes in <paramref name="selectedStrokes" /> is not in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes" /> property.
A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> objects to select.
A collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> objects to select.
Selects a combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> objects.

An <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> can contain <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> objects, which are created in response to user stylus input and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>可以包含<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>回應使用者手寫筆輸入中建立的物件和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>物件，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>物件。

trans-unit.source: Selected strokes will be displayed with an adorner around them for ease of recognition and manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 方便辨識和管理其適用的裝飾項會顯示所選取的筆劃。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects will not display differently when selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 選取時，不會以不同的方式顯示物件。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> in `selectedElements` is not in the Children collection, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Select%2A> ignores the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>中`selectedElements`不在子系集合，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Select%2A>忽略<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: The following example selects all the strokes and two elements on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會選取所有筆劃和兩個項目上的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that there is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> called `textbox1` and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> called `button1` - and that both controls are child elements of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>呼叫`textbox1`和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>呼叫`button1`-，而且兩個控制項的子元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: One or more strokes in <paramref name="selectedStrokes" /> is not included in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes" /> property.
Occurs when the selection on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> changes.
This event is raised after a set of ink strokes and/or elements has been selected and applied by the user.
trans-unit.target: 選取並由使用者套用一組筆墨筆劃及 （或） 項目後，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: If, instead, you must handle a request that select a set of ink strokes and/or elements before the selection is applied, add an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果相反地，您必須處理的要求選取的筆墨筆劃及 （或） 項目集，套用至選取項目之前，加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanging>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example prevents the user from making a selection smaller than its original size.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會防止使用者進行選取範圍小於其原始大小。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new set of ink strokes and/or elements is being selected.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanging> event is raised when strokes and/or elements are selected by the user - but before the change is applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanging>筆劃及 （或） 項目選取由使用者-但之前會套用變更時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanging> event is processed when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventHandler> receives an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanging>處理事件時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventHandler>接收<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventArgs>物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventArgs> provides methods for accessing <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> objects after they are selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionChangingEventArgs> 提供方法來存取<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>和<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>之後使用者選取的物件。

trans-unit.source: After the change is applied, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 套用變更之後，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanged>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanging> event does not occur when the selected strokes are deleted or when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingMode%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionChanging>會刪除選取的筆觸或時不會發生事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.ActiveEditingMode%2A>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: The following example makes selected strokes royal blue.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例使選取的筆劃皇家藍色。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the user moves a selection of strokes and/or elements.
This event occurs after a selection of strokes and/or elements is moved, but before the stroke or element data is updated to record its new position.
trans-unit.target: 移動選取的筆觸和 （或） 項目，但前的筆觸或元素更新資料以記錄其新位置之後，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: Add an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoving> event.
trans-unit.target: 加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoving>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example unselects items on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> after the user moves them.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會取消項目選取上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>之後，使用者移動它們。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before selected strokes and elements are moved.
This event occurs after the user requests that a selection of strokes and/or elements be moved, but before the change is applied.
trans-unit.target: 使用者要求移動選取的筆觸和 （或） 項目，但會套用變更之前，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an argument of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs> with two properties: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式會接收類型的引數<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs>兩個屬性：<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection before the move and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection after the move.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> 定義在移動之前選取範圍邊界和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>定義在移動之後選取範圍邊界。

trans-unit.source: After the change is applied, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoved> event will occur.
trans-unit.target: 套用變更之後，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionMoved>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example prevents the user from moving selected items vertically on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會防止使用者在垂直移動選取的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a selection of strokes and/or elements has been resized by the user.
This event is raised after a selection of strokes and/or elements is resized.
trans-unit.target: 選取的筆觸和 （或） 項目會調整大小之後，就會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: If, instead, you must handle a request to resize a selection before the strokes and/or elements are resized, add an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResizing> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果相反地，您必須處理的要求之前的筆劃及/或項目會調整大小調整選取項目，加入事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResizing>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example unselects all the items on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> after the user re-sizes the selection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會取消所有項目選取上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>使用者重新調整選取項目之後。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before selected strokes and elements are resized.
This event occurs after the user requests that a selection of strokes and/or elements be resized, but before the change is applied.
trans-unit.target: 在使用者要求調整選取的筆觸和 （或） 項目之後, 但套用變更之前，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an argument of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs> that contains two properties: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式會接收類型的引數<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs>，其中包含兩個屬性：<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection before the resizing operation and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A> defines the boundaries of the selection after the resizing operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.OldRectangle%2A> 定義選取範圍，再調整大小作業的邊界和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasSelectionEditingEventArgs.NewRectangle%2A>定義的調整大小作業之後選取範圍邊界。

trans-unit.source: After the strokes and/or elements are updated with the new size, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResized> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 新的大小，更新的筆劃及/或項目之後<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.SelectionResized>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example prevents the user from making a selection smaller than its original size.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會防止使用者進行選取範圍小於其原始大小。

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the bottom property.
The bottom coordinate of <c>element</c>.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Bottom" /> attached property for a given dependency object.
The following example demonstrates how to set the position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定的位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: A collection of application gestures that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> will recognize.
Sets the application gestures that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> will recognize.
The following example demonstrates how to set up an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> to recognize application gestures.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>辨識應用程式的筆勢。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.IsGestureRecognizerAvailable" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
The element on which to set the left property.
The left coordinate of <c>element</c>.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Left" /> attached property for a given dependency object.
The following example demonstrates how to set the position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定的位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the right property.
The right coordinate of <c>element</c>.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Right" /> attached property for a given dependency object.
The following example demonstrates how to set the position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定的位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the top property.
The top coordinate of <c>element</c>.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Top" /> attached property for a given dependency object.
The following example demonstrates how to set the position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定的位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a stroke drawn by the user is added to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes" /> property.
This event is raised when a user completes a stroke using a pointing device.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者完成筆觸，使用指標裝置時，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, a user might raise a stylus from a digitizer after making a motion, thereby completing a stroke.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用者可能會引發手寫筆離數位板後移動，藉此完成筆劃。

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an argument of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasStrokeCollectedEventArgs>, which references the completed stroke.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式會接收類型的引數<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasStrokeCollectedEventArgs>，會參考已完成的 stroke。

trans-unit.source: The stroke is also added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 筆劃也會加入至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: The programmatic addition of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> object to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> collection does not raise this event.
trans-unit.target: 以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>物件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>集合不會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.StrokeCollected" /> routed event.
Occurs when user erases a stroke.

This event occurs when a user erases ink whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByPoint> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByStroke>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者是否清除筆墨時，就會發生此事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByPoint>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByStroke>。

trans-unit.target: 反昇

trans-unit.source: The following example reports the number of strokes that are on an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.StrokeErased> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會報告上的筆劃數<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.StrokeErased>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByPoint> and the user erases the middle of a stroke, the number of strokes on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> increases.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByPoint>和使用者清除筆觸筆劃數目的中間上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>會增加。

trans-unit.source: This is because the old stroke was replaced by two new strokes.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為兩個新筆劃取代舊的 stroke。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.StrokeErased" /> routed event.
Occurs just before a user erases a stroke.
Handle this event when you want to check whether a stroke should be erased.
trans-unit.target: 處理這個事件，當您想要檢查是否應該清除筆觸。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true` if you want to prevent the stroke from being erased.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性`true`如果您想要防止筆劃清除。

trans-unit.source: You can use this technique when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByStroke> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByPoint>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這項技術時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingModeInverted%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByStroke>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode.EraseByPoint>。

trans-unit.source: The following example prevents any strokes rendered as highlighters from being erased.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例可避免轉譯為螢光筆清除任何筆觸。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> is connected to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 此範例假設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>連線到此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of ink <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> objects collected by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> objects contained within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
trans-unit.target: 集合<see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />內含物件<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> objects for the same <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用兩個<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>物件具有相同<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: In this example, player one and player two each use an individual "inking surface" even though they share the same <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，其中 player 與 player 兩個每個使用個別 「 筆跡介面"雖然兩者共用相同<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes the click event is connected to the event handler, `switchPlayersButton_Click`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設 click 事件的事件處理常式中，連接`switchPlayersButton_Click`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A> property of an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> to another <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何將繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>到另一個<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes" /> dependency property.
Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Strokes" /> property is replaced.
The following example demonstrates how to use two <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> objects that are co-located on the same <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用兩個<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>會共置於相同的物件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: In this example, player one and player two each use an individual "inking surface" even though they share the same <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，其中 player 與 player 兩個每個使用個別 「 筆跡介面"雖然兩者共用相同<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the `switchPlayersButton_Click` event is connected to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例假設`switchPlayersButton_Click`事件已連結至事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
Adds the specified object to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />.
Not used.
Adds the text that within the tags in markup.
Always throws an <see cref="T:System.ArgumentException" />.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Top" /> attached property.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to override standard <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> cursor functionality to support a custom cursor.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" /> is using a custom cursor; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas" />正在使用自訂的資料指標，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> will change the cursor style to reflect the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A> while the cursor is within the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>會變更以反映目前的資料指標樣式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>而游標位於範圍內<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: If this behavior is not wanted, for example, when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> uses a custom cursor, set this property to `true`, and the cursor will not change with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個問題不需要，比方說，當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>使用自訂的資料指標，將此屬性設定為`true`，並不會變更游標<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.EditingMode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use a cursor that is different than the one supplied by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用不同於所提供的一個資料指標<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of visual child elements within this element.
The number of visual child elements for this element.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目的視覺化子項目數。
